open.title: Octotel Outage | Lakeside
open.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Lakeside, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
